abstract: The value that indicates that the progress is tracking a file operation.
overview:
## Discussion

If you set this value for the progress [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/kind], set a value in the user info dictionary for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileOperationKindKey].

The system assumes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress] of this kind uses bytes as the unit of work. The default implementation of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] takes advantage of that to return more specific text than it does otherwise. If present, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileTotalCountKey] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileCompletedCountKey] keys in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/userInfo] dictionary for the overall count of files.

# file

**Type Property**

The value that indicates that the progress is tracking a file operation.

## Declaration

```swift
static let file: ProgressKind
```

## Discussion

If you set this value for the progress [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/kind], set a value in the user info dictionary for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileOperationKindKey].

The system assumes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress] of this kind uses bytes as the unit of work. The default implementation of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] takes advantage of that to return more specific text than it does otherwise. If present, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileTotalCountKey] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileCompletedCountKey] keys in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/userInfo] dictionary for the overall count of files.
title: file
